sect2.title: HTTPSender
sect2.para: Used to send messages via HTTP protocol using POST method as default to the URL specified by the 'address' property. The HTTP method can be changed using the 'method' property. (for complete list of available methods see the java.net.HttpURLConnection class documentation)
The expected HTTP response codes can be set using 'expectedResponseCode' property. Codes must be separated. by comma. Default expected response code is 200.

It is also possible to set headers of HTTP request. For this purposes there is a property (child element of 'message' element) named 'headers' and its childs called 'header' with name/value attributes.
